snippet: Ramunas Navardauskas won the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia with a solo breakaway, and Vincenzo Nibali held on to the overall lead.
abstract: Lithuanian cyclist Ramunas Navardauskas wins 11th stage of the Giro d'Italia bicylce race; Vincenzo Nibali holds on to overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Ramunas Navardauskas won the 11th stage of the Giro d’Italia with a solo breakaway, and Vincenzo Nibali held on to the overall lead.

headline.seo: Lithuanian Wins 11th Stage of Giro d’Italia
headline.main: Lithuanian Wins 11th Stage of Giro d’Italia
